data.message: Hey. My brothers account has been disabled for no reason. His account name is Aaron Mcloughlin, and his birthday is the 5th of June, 2015. His account seems to have vanished for no reason. When he tries to log in it say that his account has been disabled. He did try to change his birth date last Friday as he realised his account held an incorrect birthdate which would make him 25. He is 16. He thinks that it might of said something like you are not eligible to have an account as you must be 13 and over to be eligible. He has done nothing wrong and has not violated any of facebooks rules. Please investigate this and reactivate his account. I can give his contact information if needed.

replies.message: Hi Neil, we're sorry you brother is having problems with his account. If your brother's account is disabled, he may be able to submit an appeal using the email address associated to his account. You can find out more information in our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/147434898662568 -Elisha
